v3.0

  • Home screen widgetnew!: quick glance at top articles from your home screen
  • On-screen D-padnew!: swipe it to quickly navigate nested comment threads
    Enable in Comments display options
    Psst, it supports Konami code!
  • New list option: Auto mark as viewed
  • New app option: Remember last launched screen
  • New swipe gestures: vote/save stories, expand/collapse comments
If you encounter issues, please send me details via feedback dialog.

v2.8-2.9

  • Full screen reading mode for article & readability
  • New section: Best stories
  • New option: block ads for internal browser
